title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 06, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 06, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to the firing of Bill O’Brien in Houston. Would he still have a job had he not been the General Manager? We’re joined by Houston Sports Talk Radio Host Sean Salisbury, Padres Color Analyst Mark Grant, and NBCSN’s Chris Simms. Plus, the guys talk past relationships.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
